content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'adls2container_adlsgen2frank_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [adls2container_adlsgen2frank_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://adlsgen2frank.dfs.core.windows.net/adls2container', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE asacourse.customeraddress (
	[CustomerID] int,
	[AddressID] int,
	[AddressType] varchar(8000),
	[rowguid] varchar(8000),
	[ModifiedDate] datetime2(7)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'data/customeraddress.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [adls2container_adlsgen2frank_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM asacourse.customeraddress
GO
